sourcesContent:
import { config } from "./canvasConfig"

/****
 * Canvas drawing functions
 */
const drawBlock = (context, x, y, colour = config.EMPTY_BG, strokeColour = config.BORDER) => {
	context.fillStyle = colour
	context.fillRect(x * config.BLOCK, y * config.BLOCK, config.BLOCK, config.BLOCK)
	context.strokeStyle = strokeColour
	context.strokeRect(x * config.BLOCK, y * config.BLOCK, config.BLOCK, config.BLOCK)
}

export default drawBlock
